description: A React component named 'Quiz' that presents a multi-question survey interface for user preferences related to energy level, budget, duration, and interests. It manages state locally using useState and synchronizes with application state via useStore hook. The component includes event handlers for toggling interests and submitting the quiz data, and renders buttons, inputs, and progress indicators.

methods.name: Quiz()
methods.description: Main React functional component implementing the quiz UI and logic.
